name: Enigma (itch) (specsboy1999)
description:
A 1st person puzzle game which allows the player to switch between the past and the present. 

You play as an archeologist who has found themself in a lost city, switching between the city in its prime and it in modern day. Their only way out being through finding the temporal crystals, hidden behind the inhabitant's ancient technology.

Only you can find all of the crystals and escape to solve ... the ENIGMA!

Credits

Art:

  • Ben Plant
  • Brendan Littleford
  • Yuk-Tin Yau - https://www.artstation.com/yuktin

Design:

  • Adam Frank - https://adamfr52.wixsite.com/portfolio
  • Michael Mannell - https://michaelgmannell.wixsite.com/portfolio
  • Richard Packer - https://richardpacker.wixsite.com/morikali

Tech:

  • Cameron Savage - https://camsavo1.wixsite.com/website
  • Sophie Gaynor
  • Bharathkumar Kanhaiyalaverma

Controls

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Q: Switch Time

E: Interact

F: Flashlight

P: Pause
